00210975a618032c37efcd92225e5f18af8e558b.query:
UPDATE
                        problems
                    SET
                        visible = true
                    WHERE
                        id = ?

06911aa537434d8fab530d4d892ed22473618095.query:
INSERT INTO meetings (
            title,
            description,
            meeting_time
        )
        VALUES (?, ?, ?)
        RETURNING id

0e859355a3acaafd23648dbee85b55dbb80d56e4.query:
SELECT datetime('now') < end
        FROM competitions
        JOIN problems
        WHERE competitions.id = problems.competition_id
        AND problems.id = ?

12c48be322eec5d00ffe22a7683f9e2c185f4b83.query:
INSERT INTO test_results (
                    submission_id,
                    test_id,
                    runtime,
                    output,
                    error,
                    success
                ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

184aa15ead1271c38756d47e03a5370b018625c4.query:
UPDATE submissions
        SET success = false,
            error = 'Manually overridden by officer'
        WHERE id = ?

1c033b8f650a8573a79cbdbe0bd0cc7b497f41e4.query:
SELECT
                users.id,
                users.name,
                users.username,
                users.discord_id,
                users.auth as "auth: Auth"
            FROM teams
            JOIN team_members ON teams.id = team_members.team_id
            JOIN users ON team_members.user_id = users.id
            WHERE teams.id = ?

1cdef306b560169f74a139276c24127fdedca0c1.query:
UPDATE submissions
        SET success = true,
            error = NULL
        WHERE id = ?

1dc9b0c89f6472829323b4c90f3a2481ab701f9e.query:
SELECT
            id,
            title,
            description,
            meeting_time
        FROM
            meetings
        WHERE
            DATETIME('now', 'localtime', 'start of day') < DATETIME(meeting_time)
        ORDER BY
            DATETIME(meeting_time) ASC

3a6f4d995b699c571a5ed893a66008dfa74c2337.query:
SELECT id
        FROM users
        WHERE username = ?

437176589f26cd7cbcc79b3991296d4bab0b4527.query:
SELECT
            id,
            name,
            username,
            discord_id,
            auth as "auth: Auth"
        FROM
            users
        WHERE
            username = ?

52253fe9103b5a5ec67cb610459c05d0dcaa9e7a.query:
SELECT
            users.id,
            users.name,
            users.username,
            users.discord_id,
            users.auth as "auth: Auth"
        FROM teams
        JOIN team_members ON teams.id = team_members.team_id
        JOIN users ON team_members.user_id = users.id
        WHERE teams.id = ?

5a93325c7b768cabb796adf44b98ef32adbb9a0c.query:
SELECT
            id,
            name,
            username,
            discord_id,
            auth as "auth: Auth"
        FROM
            users
        WHERE discord_id = ?

5e928121e8bc59da4e6dd18fb47b50ba6b25caad.query:
INSERT INTO tests (
                problem_id,
                test_number,
                input,
                expected_output,
                max_runtime
            )
            VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

5f4ec89030caf7c36f3826ceed37a70f393ae100.query: SELECT datetime('now') < end FROM competitions WHERE id = ?

73a9f0421bb76eca718c087fe20d8c7f30ece15c.query:
SELECT
            id,
            title,
            description,
            meeting_time
        FROM
            meetings
        WHERE
            DATETIME('now', 'localtime', 'start of day') < DATETIME(meeting_time)
        ORDER BY
            meeting_time ASC

75e6c4997b57df5977b5ae4a8b6517240380ee55.query:
SELECT
            id,
            name,
            username,
            discord_id,
            auth as "auth: Auth"
        FROM
            users
        WHERE
            id = ?

808daa7e5caf4d37ab0e417b18018f44ebe48073.query:
SELECT user_id
        FROM team_members
        JOIN teams ON teams.id = team_members.team_id
        WHERE user_id = ? AND competition_id = (SELECT competition_id FROM teams WHERE team_id = ?)

83a93a622f2c6ff1313b832210a826b189833bb4.query:
SELECT
                        id,
                        title,
                        description,
                        runner,
                        template,
                        competition_id,
                        visible,
                        difficulty as "difficulty: Difficulty"
                    FROM
                        problems
                    WHERE
                        visible = false AND publish_time < datetime('now')

8bb94b1f035f45983c2b2e4c08ad0507b2737c61.query: SELECT COUNT(id) as count FROM submissions WHERE problem_id = ? AND success = true

8c1aae98f70d1608759764f82f6f5dac75aed151.query:
UPDATE problems SET
        title = ?,
        description = ?,
        difficulty = ?,
        visible = ?
        WHERE id = ?

934778f4ac7f92fad27440366dbecf5569da493b.query: INSERT INTO teams (competition_id, name) VALUES (?, ?) RETURNING id

b19e4c1a75c45b4e6e1220b11c0694541e0ae039.query: SELECT datetime('now') < end FROM competitions WHERE id = (SELECT competition_id FROM teams WHERE id = ?)

b51a1de31bbe1e32f8b000c0a770bd38d3ed288b.query: INSERT INTO competitions (name, start, end) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING id

d52d85e133b5c2e6706a0d4c279a23d75b4f3f35.query:
SELECT
            id,
            title,
            description,
            runner,
            template,
            competition_id,
            visible,
            difficulty as "difficulty: Difficulty"
        FROM
            problems
        WHERE
            id = ?

e144a362b64a00e9b312f7e0ce2d17b4b6a6752d.query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(problem_id)) AS count
        FROM users
        JOIN submissions ON users.id = submissions.user_id
        WHERE success = true
        AND users.id = ?;

ebec559dc453e6cc3ebc8b02d355a72827e530ee.query:
SELECT
            id,
            title,
            description,
            activity_type as "activity_type: ActivityType"
        FROM
            activities
        WHERE
            meeting_id = ?

f05bde99ceb0835316f35aee67f9bb9f23782aa7.query:
DELETE FROM team_members
        WHERE id IN (
            SELECT team_members.id
            FROM team_members
            JOIN teams ON teams.id = team_members.team_id
            WHERE team_members.user_id = ? AND teams.competition_id = ?
        )

fbec0128a853b4b42c540ea3352b0f879f4d6a8b.query:
SELECT
            id,
            title,
            description,
            meeting_time
        FROM
            meetings
        WHERE
            id = ?

fe1d80b4ccce2aa6fec3e6b6ce69c8bad42cba0c.query:
INSERT INTO activities (
                meeting_id,
                title,
                description,
                activity_type
            )
            VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
